basic.description: This course focuses on the metatheory of first order logic. A mastery of the syntax and semantics of, and a natural deduction system for, first order logic is presumed. Among other results, the soundness and completeness of such a natural deduction system, and Godel's first incompleteness theorem, are proved.
basic.subject: PHI
basic.title: Modern Logic I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: PHI 3130 or equivalent, or instructor permission.
